mapper.sql: user_id, nickname, username, `password`, avatar, personal_sign, github, mail, home_path, hometown, ctime, mtime, last_login_time
mapper.select:
select
from b_user
and nickname like concat('%', #{nickname}, '%')
and username = #{username}
mapper.insert:
insert into b_user
nickname,
username,
`password`,
avatar,
personal_sign,
github,
mail,
home_path,
hometown,
ctime,
mtime,
last_login_time,

mapper.update:
update b_user
nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
avatar = #{avatar,jdbcType=INTEGER},
personal_sign = #{personalSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
github = #{github,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mail = #{mail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
home_path = #{homePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hometown = #{hometown,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mtime = #{mtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update b_user set nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, avatar = #{avatar,jdbcType=INTEGER}, personal_sign = #{personalSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, github = #{github,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mail = #{mail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, home_path = #{homePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hometown = #{hometown,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, mtime = #{mtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
